definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: That floats on hight o'er vales and hills.
In some years, April bursts upon Virginia hills in one prodigious leap ?
sentences.chinese: 有時候，四月一個健步就躍上了弗吉尼亞的小山丘。

sentences.english: It's like running down a grass-covered hill.
sentences.chinese: 它就像跑在綠草覆蓋的山丘。

sentences.english: This paper has systematically conducted research on design methods of ecological river in the mountain area.
sentences.chinese: 本文對山丘區生態河道設計方法進行了系統的研究。

sentences.english: He was buried on a hillside outside Nanjing, not far from Sun Yat-sen’s mausoleum.
sentences.chinese: 他被埋葬在南京郊外的一個小山丘邊，離中山陵不遠。

sentences.english: One of them was perched up in a tree on the hill overlooking the stadium.
sentences.chinese: 其中一人還爬到了山丘的一棵樹上，俯瞰體育場。

sentences.english: So the valleys that cut through the mountains are extremely fertile.
sentences.chinese: 那些截斷山丘的谷地都是非常肥沃的。

sentences.english: There are one or two hills in Norfolk, but otherwise the landscape is as flat as a pancake.
sentences.chinese: 諾福克有一兩座小山丘，但除此之外是一馬平川。

sentences.english: A small temple once lay somewhere in the hill.
sentences.chinese: 在山丘的某處，曾經有座小廟。

sentences.english: Towns situated in the hills near Rio de Janeiro were worst hit.
sentences.chinese: 位在里約熱內盧市附近的山丘城鎮，災情最爲慘重。

sentences.english: The hills flatten out here, and the ground is almost level.
sentences.chinese: 這裏的山丘變平了，地面基本上是平坦的。

sentences.english: Near the crash site, Kim wakes up on the side of the hill.
sentences.chinese: 在墜車的地點，金姆在山丘的邊上醒了過來。

sentences.english: The roof logically became a part of the existing green mound.
sentences.chinese: 屋頂順利成章地成爲現有的綠色山丘的一部分。

sentences.english: She neared the crest of a hillock and was soon out of sight.
sentences.chinese: 它走近一座小山丘的頂部，很快就不見了蹤影。

sentences.english: I always dream of myself to be able to fly, can leap the massif and the creek.
sentences.chinese: 我總是夢見自己能飛，能躍過山丘和小河。

sentences.english: We acquire silicon from the rocks which have been lying all over the hills and mountains for aeons.
sentences.chinese: 我們從爲永世在整個山丘和山一直在躺的岩石獲得硅。

definition: Shulin city in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
halfway up a mountain/lit. waist of mountain
